However, carriers may have abnormally small, pale red blood cells and related changes that can be detected with a blood test.",GHR,X-linked sideroblastic anemia and ataxia
What are the treatments for X-linked sideroblastic anemia and ataxia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of X-linked sideroblastic anemia and ataxia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: X
